scenario_text.value: I can’t believe this is where everybody went.
Hey, Agumon! Where are you going?!

I’m not going anywhere! Look! There’s
something here!
Hey! What are you all doing?
Why are all of you out here?

I just got this feeling like something was
there.

Hmph! Be on your guard, everyone! There’s
definitely something there!
I can smell something! We have to be careful!

No, I’m telling you to be careful BECAUSE
I don’t know!

Whatever it is, it’s certainly a creature
like us.
But we can’t say if it’s friend or foe.

See, look over there... Something’s rustling
through the brush!

Wait, don’t get any closer! It could be
dangerous. Let’s watch from here.
